content:
#!/bin/bash

module load java/1.8.0_20 python/3.5.1 gcc/5.4.0

# usage: 
# remove the log, run a "does it move" test on milestone 5, & log it
#    rm ati/M05.io.log; ati/test_io M05 | tee ati/M05.io.log

# "do anything" test:
cfg1="-nogui -g:0 -h:3 -w:3 -k:3 -t:5000 -b:500"
cfg2="-nogui -g:1 -h:7 -w:6 -k:4 -t:4000 -b:500"
cfg3="-nogui -g:0 -h:9 -w:7 -k:5 -t:5000 -b:500"
p1ortie="grep -c -e 'Winner is: 1' -e 'Winner is: 0'"
p2ortie="grep -c -e 'Winner is: 2' -e 'Winner is: 0'"

JAR="ConnectK_nolog.jar"

opRandom="py:ati/src/TestRandomAI.py"
opBasic="py:ati/src/TestBasicAI.py"

# usage: 
# remove the log, run a "does it move" test on milestone 5, & log it
#    rm ati/M05.io.log; ati/test_io M05 | tee ati/M05.io.log

for dir in Submissions/${1}_*/${2}* ; do
  found=''
  for ai in $dir/*/src/*AI.py ; do
    [ -f "$ai" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo -n ${gname} ",  python, "
    found="py:${ai}"
  done
  for ai in $dir/*/bin/*AI.class ; do
    [ -f "$ai" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo -n ${gname} ", java, "
    found="${ai%.*}"
  done
  for ai in $dir/*/bin/*AI ; do
  #for ai in $dir/*/bin/*AJ ; do 
    [ -f "$ai" ] || continue
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo -n ${gname} ", cpp, "
    found="cpp:${ai}"
  done
  if [ $found ] ; then
    echo "================= STARTING VS $found ====================" 
    echo -n "RANDOM, "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg1 "${found}" $opRandom  2>&1| eval ${p1ortie} |tr '\n' ' '   
    echo -n ", "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg1 $opRandom "${found}" 2>&1| eval $p2ortie |tr '\n' ' '
    echo -n ", "
    
    java -jar $JAR $cfg2 "${found}" $opRandom  2>&1| eval $p1ortie |tr '\n' ' '
    echo -n ", "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg2 $opRandom "${found}" 2>&1| eval $p2ortie |tr '\n' ' '
    echo -n ", "
    
    java -jar $JAR $cfg3 "${found}" $opRandom  2>&1| eval $p1ortie |tr '\n' ' '
    echo -n ", "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg3 $opRandom "${found}" 2>&1| eval $p2ortie |tr '\n' ' '
    echo -n ", BASIC, "
  
    java -jar $JAR $cfg1 "${found}" $opBasic  2>&1| eval ${p1ortie} |tr '\n' ' ' 
    echo -n ", "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg1 $opBasic "${found}" 2>&1| eval $p2ortie |tr '\n' ' ' 
    echo -n ", "
    
    java -jar $JAR $cfg2 "${found}" $opBasic  2>&1| eval $p1ortie |tr '\n' ' ' 
    echo -n ", "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg2 $opBasic "${found}" 2>&1| eval $p2ortie |tr '\n' ' ' 
    echo -n ", "
    
    java -jar $JAR $cfg3 "${found}" $opBasic  2>&1| eval $p1ortie |tr '\n' ' ' 
    echo -n ", "
    java -jar $JAR $cfg3 $opBasic "${found}" 2>&1| eval $p2ortie |tr '\n' ' ' 

  else
    gname=${dir#*/M0*/}; gname=${gname%%_*}
    echo $gname ", missing, 0,0,0,0,0,0" ; 
  fi
  echo
  echo "======================================================================================="
  echo
done
